name: opelresi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2)))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Ordered pair membership in a restriction. Exercise 13 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-1995.)
